dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3917 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend funding for the special diabetes program for Indians.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mullin (for himself and Mr. Ruiz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend funding for the special diabetes program for Indians.

section.header: Extension for special diabetes program for Indians
section.text: Section 330C(c)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–3(c)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (D), by striking the period at the end and inserting and $112,500,000 for the period consisting of the second, third, and fourth quarters of fiscal year 2018; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
